snippet: Automakers said traffic at East Coast dealerships slowed as residents braced for the storm.
abstract: Commerce Department reports retail sales fell 0.3 percent in October, after 1.3 percent increase in September, as Hurricane Sandy slowed automobile purchases.
lead_paragraph: Automakers said traffic at East Coast dealerships slowed as residents braced for the storm.

headline.seo: Hurricane Sandy Seen as Hampering Car Sales
